title: Looking for any Nasus clubs.
body:
Well, I'm just about to hit 300k on my old boy {{champion:75}}, which for my first season I'm quite proud of the achievement. So now I'm on the lookout for a club based on Nasus or Nasus Mains so I can proudly flaunt about my main as a play other champions.

 I would really love if someone could hit me up and invite me to a club in the near future.

Summoner Name is: Hanryo

replies.body: I appreciate your opinion, it'll be dearly noted
